7. OLD SWEDISH. PRO-infinitives of impersonal predicates (Falk 1997:25):
(23) a. os duger ey ther æptir ___ langa. (c. 1400)
us helps not there after PRO-OBL long-INF
`It is useless for us to long for that.'

tier.item: b. Folgt man dieser Geschichte von Vergebung und Erlösung, dann
follows one this story from forgiveness and release then
gilt die paradoxe Weisheit: Man muss seine Familie hinter sich
counts the paradoxical wisdom: one must his family behind self
lassen, um seine Familie zu gründen. Man muss vergeben können,
let in-order his family to get. one must forgive be-able,
um ___ vergeben zu werden. Denn selbst der
in-order PRO.dat forgiven to be(come).inf. then self the
Henker ist ein Opfer.
executioner is a victic
`If one follows this story from foregivenss and release, then the
paradoxical wisdom is valid: One has to leave his family behind in order
to (get married and) have a family. One has to be able to forgive in order
to be forgiven. Then even the executioner is a victim.'
(www.kinofenster.de/ausgaben/kf0209/film1.htm, 2002)

tier.item: d. Ein Recht für geistig wie körperlich behinderte Frauen, ___ nur
a right for mentally as physically disabled women PRO.dat only
von Frauen bei intimen Handlungen assistiert zu werden, gibt
by women at private activities assisted to be(come).inf is
es in der Bundesrepublik ... nicht.
there in the Federal-Republic...not.

assisted by women when engaged in private activities does not
exist in Germany.' (www.freitag.de/2002/45/02450402.php, 2002)

tier.item: e. Überdem, wenn man über den Kreis der Erfahrung hinaus ist, so
besides if one about the sphere the experience over is so

is one sure PRO.dat through experience not contradicted to
